first_para: The Hon. Emily Sophia Wedgwood Benn (born 4 October 1989) is the eldest child and only daughter of Stephen Benn (Viscount Stansgate) and Nita Clarke (née Bowes). Benn was an unsuccessful Parliamentary candidate in the 2010 United Kingdom general election, and has been selected as a candidate for the next United Kingdom general election. At the 2014 local elections, Benn was elected to the West Thornton ward of Croydon Borough Council.

full.extract: The Hon. Emily Sophia Wedgwood Benn (born 4 October 1989) is the eldest child and only daughter of Stephen Benn (Viscount Stansgate) and Nita Clarke (née Bowes). Benn was an unsuccessful Parliamentary candidate in the 2010 United Kingdom general election, and has been selected as a candidate for the next United Kingdom general election. At the 2014 local elections, Benn was elected to the West Thornton ward of Croydon Borough Council.
full.title: Emily Benn
